javadoc: A listener that will get notified of selections made by the {@link SelectionManager}.

methods.name: restoringSelection
methods.comment:
Called before and after a selection is restored.  This is useful for clients that wish to
 know when selections are changing due to the SelectionManager versus user initiated 
 selections or programmatic selections.

params.name: preRestore
params.comment:
true if the SelectionManager is about to restore selections; 
                   false when the SelectionManager is finished restoring selections.

name: SelectionManagerListener
comment: A listener that will get notified of selections made by the SelectionManager.
